text:
What is a unique characteristic of a wolf's howl?
Options:
1) It can only be heard by other wolves within a 1-mile radius.
2) It can be heard by humans from up to 10 miles away.
3) It is a form of communication that can be mimicked by other animals.
4) It is only used for mating purposes.
5) It is a warning signal to other wolves of potential threats.
options: It can only be heard by other wolves within a 1-mile radius.
It can be heard by humans from up to 10 miles away.
It is a form of communication that can be mimicked by other animals.
It is only used for mating purposes.
It is a warning signal to other wolves of potential threats.

text:
What is a unique feature of a wolf's howl?
Options:
1) It can only be heard during the day
2) It can be heard for miles
3) It is always a solo activity
4) It is only used for hunting
5) It is identical to a dog's howl
options: It can only be heard during the day
It can be heard for miles
It is always a solo activity
It is only used for hunting
It is identical to a dog's howl

text:
What is a unique characteristic of elephant skin?

Options:
1) It is scaly and dry
2) It is thin and transparent
3) It is almost hairless and wrinkled
4) It is thick and slimy
5) It is colorful and patterned
options: It is scaly and dry
It is thin and transparent
It is almost hairless and wrinkled
It is thick and slimy
It is colorful and patterned

text:
What is the average lifespan of a wolf in the wild?
Options:
1) 5-7 years
2) 10-15 years
3) 20-25 years
4) 30-35 years
options: 5-7 years
10-15 years
20-25 years
30-35 years

text:
What is a common behavior of hamsters in the wild?
Options:
1) They live in large groups.
2) They are diurnal, meaning they are active during the day.
3) They are solitary animals and only come together for mating.
4) They are carnivorous and hunt small animals.
5) They are native to Africa.
options: They live in large groups.
They are diurnal, meaning they are active during the day.
They are solitary animals and only come together for mating.
They are carnivorous and hunt small animals.
They are native to Africa.

text:
What is a unique characteristic of hamsters that helps them gather and store food?

Options:
1) Long neck to reach high shelves
2) Strong claws for digging burrows
3) Cheek pouches to carry food
4) Webbed feet for swimming
5) Good eyesight to spot predators
options: Long neck to reach high shelves
Strong claws for digging burrows
Cheek pouches to carry food
Webbed feet for swimming

Options:
1) They are carnivorous mammals
2) They are nocturnal animals
3) They have a long lifespan of up to 20 years
4) They are native to Africa
5) They are members of the rodent family

text:
What is the primary food source for elephants?
Options:
1) Fruits and leaves
2) Grasses and aquatic plants
3) Bark and roots
4) Insects and small animals
5) Carrion and dead animals
options: Fruits and leaves
Grasses and aquatic plants
Bark and roots
Insects and small animals
Carrion and dead animals

text:

Options:
1) They are blind and deaf
2) They are able to walk immediately
3) They have a full coat of fur
4) They are able to see and hear
5) They are omnivores
6) They are solitary animals

They are solitary animals
